page.title: 19CHILDREN'S CENSUS:ST.ALBANS
page.content: We are a class of 7_8 year olds at St. John Fisher School, St.Albans. We interviewed 100 children (9-10 year olds) from 5 of the 6 junior schools in our Domesday area.We asked them the following questions in June 1985. 1.Name? 2.Age? 3.Were you born in St.Albans? 4.Size of your immediate family? 5.Does your family have more than 1 car? 6.Have you any pets? 7.Have you a computer at home? 8.Have you got Gas central heating at home? 9.How much pocket money do you have? 10.How many hours of T.V.do you watch? 11.What is your favourite item of clothing?{ {TURN TO NEXT PAGE FOR OUR RESULTS }
